verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; with the Nehiloth. A Psalm of David. Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my words <S%H561><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Consider <S%H995><s%> my meditation <S%H1901><s%>.
Hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my cry <S%H7773><s%>, my King <S%H4428><s%>, and my God <S%H430><s%>; For unto thee do I pray <S%H6419><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in the morning <S%H1242><s%> shalt thou hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; In the morning <S%H1242><s%> will I order <S%H6186><s%> my prayer unto thee <S%H6822><s%>, and will keep watch.
For thou art not a God <S%H410><s%> that hath pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: Evil <S%H7451><s%> shall not sojourn with thee <S%H1481><s%>.
The arrogant <S%H1984><s%> shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>: Thou hatest <S%H8130><s%> all workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

Thou wilt destroy <S%H6><s%> them that speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> abhorreth <S%H8581><s%> the blood-thirsty <S%H1818><s%> and deceitful <S%H4820><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

But as for me <S%H7230><s%>, in the abundance of thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> will I come <S%H935><s%> into thy house <S%H1004><s%>: In thy fear <S%H3374><s%> will I worship <S%H7812><s%> toward thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

Lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> because of mine enemies <S%H8324><s%>; Make thy way <S%H1870><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%> before my face <S%H6440><s%>.

For there is no faithfulness <S%H3559><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>; Their inward <S%H7130><s%> part is very wickedness <S%H1942><s%>; Their throat <S%H1627><s%> is an open <S%H6605><s%> sepulchre <S%H6913><s%>; They flatter <S%H2505><s%> with their tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

Hold them guilty <S%H816><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; Let them fall <S%H5307><s%> by their own counsels <S%H4156><s%>; Thrust them out <S%H5080><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; For they have rebelled against thee <S%H4784><s%>.

But let all those that take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in thee rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, Let them ever <S%H5769><s%> shout for joy <S%H7442><s%>, because thou defendest <S%H5526><s%> them <S%H157><s%>: Let them also that love thy name <S%H8034><s%> be joyful in thee <S%H5970><s%>.
For thou wilt bless <S%H1288><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou wilt compass <S%H5849><s%> him with favor <S%H7522><s%> as with a shield <S%H6793><s%>.
